no-tokens-yet: You haven't sucessfully claimed any tokens yet.

step1-identity.title: Token identity

name.label: Name
name.info: Give the new token, you want to create, a descriptive/telling name.

symbol.label: Symbol
symbol.info: Choose a short symbol of 3-5 letters (numbers are allowed, too) for your new token. Please note, that the system rejects symbols that are already in use.

short-description.label: Short description
short-description.info: Describe the purpose/idea of your new token in a short version.

long-description.label: Long description
long-description.info: Describe the purpose/idea of your new token in a longer version.

step1-identity.info: The basic infos about this tokens identity.
